segments.text: What do you like to do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a girl of many interests . I like dance , chess , collecting stamps , travelling and taking photos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of dance do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I am not interested in Chinese chess . It is too difficult for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can learn Chinese checkers or military chess . Both of them are much easier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will try . As for stamp , don't you think it is an expensive hobby ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . But it is full of fun and knowledge . What about you , what do you like to do as hobby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like gardening . I take care of them everyday . I like those flowers and the swing in my garden . If the weather is nice , I would like to lie on the lawn .
segments.speaker: S1
